body_html:
Pytorch is heavily integrated with cuDNN (e.g. LSTM implementation)

I realized that when looking at the backend wrapper.

Also, it is probably heavily optimized...

I'll do some comparisons once I got the CPU implementation going.

body:
> Pytorch is heavily integrated with cuDNN (e.g. LSTM implementation)

I realized that when looking at the backend wrapper.

> Also, it is probably heavily optimized...
